params.name: --url
params.description: URL of webhook or a Bitrix24 domain, when token used

params.name: --token
params.description: Access token, when app auth method used

methods.name: GetDealsFilterStructure
methods.description: Returns the field structure for filtering deals in the GetDealsList method

params.name: --empty
params.description: True > structure with empty valuse, False > field descriptions at values

methods.name: GetCalendarList
methods.description: Gets a list of calendars of the specified owner

params.name: --url
params.description: URL of webhook or a Bitrix24 domain, when token used

params.name: --owner
params.description: Calendar owner ID

params.name: --type
params.description: Calendar type: user, group, company_calendar, location, etc.

params.name: --token
params.description: Access token, when app auth method used

methods.name: CreateCalendar
methods.description: Creates a new calendar

params.name: --url
params.description: URL of webhook or a Bitrix24 domain, when token used

params.name: --fields
params.description: Calendar fields structure. See GetCalendarStructure

params.name: --token
params.description: Access token, when app auth method used

methods.name: UpdateCalendar
methods.description: Changes the calendar settings

params.name: --url
params.description: URL of webhook or a Bitrix24 domain, when token used

params.name: --calendar
params.description: Calendar ID

params.name: --fields
params.description: Deal fields structure. See. GetDealStructure

params.name: --token
params.description: Access token, when app auth method used

methods.name: DeleteCalendar
methods.description: Deletes an existing calendar

params.name: --url
params.description: URL of webhook or a Bitrix24 domain, when token used

params.name: --calendar
params.description: Calendar ID

params.name: --owner
params.description: Calendar owner ID

params.name: --type
params.description: Calendar type: user, group

params.name: --token
params.description: Access token, when app auth method used

methods.name: GetUserBusy
methods.description: Gets an array of user events in the specified interval

params.name: --url
params.description: URL of webhook or a Bitrix24 domain, when token used

params.name: --users
params.description: IDs of users or a single user

params.name: --from
params.description: Start date of the period

params.name: --to
params.description: End date of the period

params.name: --token
params.description: Access token, when app auth method used

methods.name: GetCustomCalendarSettings

params.name: --token

methods.name: GetCalendarSettingsStructure

methods.name: GetCalendarStructure

methods.name: GetCalendarEvents

params.description: Calendar type: user, group, company_calendar

params.name: --filter
params.description: Events filter. See GetCalendarEventsFilterStructure

params.description: Participation status: Y (agreed), N (refused), Q (did not answer)
